com.xilinx.rapidwright.placer.blockplacer

Class HardMacro

  • Object
    • com.xilinx.rapidwright.design.ModuleInst
      • com.xilinx.rapidwright.placer.blockplacer.HardMacro
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Object>

    public class HardMacro
extends ModuleInst
implements Comparable<Object>
    This extends ModuleInst and is used by BlockPlacer and BlockPlacer2 to help calculate system cost.

      • overlaps

        public boolean overlaps(HardMacro hm)
        Determines if the hard macros overlap. Hard macros are considered overlapping if their bounding boxes overlap.
        Parameters:
        hm - Hard macro to check against.
        Returns:
